title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: People may be drawn to you for your compassionate wisdom, even if youre not feeling very wise or compassionate. In fact, you might be on the hunt for a little insight, inspiration, and kindness yourself today. Avoid the impulse to fulfill what you think are other peoples expectations of sympathy. Instead, simply strive to deliver the best version of yourself. Your authenticity shines brightest when you just let your heart-light beam. Mystical teacher Neville Goddard said, Love is our birthright. Do not go seeking that which you are. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
